title.value: Радиологические и экономические показатели производства продукции животноводства в Хойникском районе
Radiological and economic indicators of livestock production in Khoiniki district

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Karpenko, A.F., Institute of Radiology, Gomel (Belarus)
Dubezhinskij, E.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents the results from a study of radiological situation in animal farming in Khoiniki district, Gomel region. The radiological situation is gradually improving. It has been established that grain, potatoes and vegetables satisfy cesium-137 content standards. Density of radionuclides in milk and beef is decreasing. Excess content of Sr-90 has been observed in grain used for production purposes. Since 2000 there has been a tendency to increase in animal production. At the enterprises under study provision for increasing milk yields and animal body-weight has been found. The economic effectiveness of milk, beef and pork pro-duction has been evaluated
